transcript: this Marketplace of alternative education sprouted from demand the problem for the alternative education scene is the expectations that people set and the track record that they lie about people spend two hundred thousand dollars in four years and going to debt that they can't get out of because College promises nothing on the other hand a guy sells a thousand dollar course and promises that you're going to make ten thousand dollars within 30 days the course may be exceptional it may teach a lot of skills but if someone doesn't make ten thousand dollars in 30 days they hate the guy the game is shifted also because YouTube has just blown up a lot of really good stuff is available online for free
